[[File:TolkienIndex.png|frame|The Tolkien Index logo]]
The '''Tolkien Index''' is a not-for-profit website which aims to produce a comprehensive index of names from writings by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (and associated editorial matter) on [[Middle-earth]] which do not already have an index.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://tolkienindex.net/index/Main_Page|articlename=Main Page|website=[http://tolkienindex.net/index/Main_Page Tolkien Index]|accessed=01-Jan-2012}}</ref> [[Morgan Thomsen]] is the owner and main contributor of the website, whilst Daniel Helen is its webmaster.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.tolkienindex.net/index/Tolkien_Index:About#Project_contributors|articlename=About: Project contributors|website=[http://tolkienindex.net/index/Main_Page Tolkien Index]|accessed=23-June-2012}}</ref> It was founded on [[24 June]], [[2011]].<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://tolkienindex.net/w/index.php?title=Main_Page&action=history|articlename=Revision history of 'Main Page'|website=[http://tolkienindex.net/index/Main_Page Tolkien Index]|accessed=01-Jan-2012}}</ref>

==Reception==
Noting the website Tolkien Index in November 2011, ''Tolkien Transactions'', an on-line review journal, wrote: "''[t]rusting that the authors will continue the work, this promises to be a very valuable index resource''".<ref>{{webcite|author=Troels Forchhammer|articleurl=http://parmarkenta.blogspot.com/2011_11_01_archive.html|articlename=Tolkien Transactions XVIII|dated=5 November 2011|website=[http://parmarkenta.blogspot.com/p/tolkien-transactions.html Tolkien Transations]|accessed=2 March 2012}}</ref>
